title: What are some questions that have no right answer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Which character is better superman or batman. This is a matter of bias and prefrence while 2 plus 2 is a cut and dry case of 4. So is any case of fictional characters. Which son or daughter do you love the most. The parent may know but they  cant give this honest answer as its going to make the others unhappy. Does Califirnia or Hawaii have better beaches? As better needs to be defined not all people would agree with the definition and even if they did its like one person that thinks pizza hut pizza is greater than dominos to a person convinced dominos is greater than Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, and any other pizza franchise of this nature.

Why did you kill my father?Why did you cheat on me?Why did you put your microwave through the wood chipper?Why did you burn your house down?Why did you throw your cat out the window?Why did you slap your grandmother?Why did you slash my tires?Why did you rob the bank?Why is there a bomb in your suitcase?Why am I so ugly?Does your mom know that you wrecked the car?
